def_cn: (篮球、美式橄榄球、冰球等比赛过程中的)暂停
def_en: In basketball, American football, ice hockey, and some other sports, when a team calls a time out, they call a stop to the game for a few minutes in order to rest and discuss how they are going to play.

def_cn: (工作或活动中的)暂停时间，休息时间
def_en: If you take time out from a job or activity, you have a break from it and do something different instead.
